tag_message: Aikuma Version 1.0.0 RC4.
RC 3
1.0.0-rc.1 incorporating many changes, including new directory structure.
Now displays recording name and speaker image in ListenACtivity, and added language codes to the respeaking images. Multiple bug fixes

Fixed bug whereby multiple instantiations of InterleavedPlayer would cause
playing to stop after the first segment.

Changes:
-Default checkboxes used for languages in the recording metadata activity.
-Added a time display in the recording activity.
-Added a superimposed plus icon to make more clear what the add speaker buttons
do.
-Incorporated a background noise threshold detector for audio-driven
commentaries.
-Added a noise sensitivity slider for audio-driven commentaries.
-Disabled movement of the seekbar in respeaking activities; also removed the
useless play and pause button in the seekbar fragment.
-Various audio-driven commentary bug fixes.
fixed issue where the sync now button gets pushed of screen using a better approach
added a help button, made the play button green in thumb respeaking. Made the sync-now button viewable on the htc phones
Fixed a bug from Beta 2 that caused phones to crash on opening the app.
Implemented the force sync button
Beta 17: Closes #164
Beta 16: Closed #161 and adjusted #158 fix as per Lauren's suggestion
Aikuma Beta 15. Closes #158, #132, #163.
1.0.0 Beta 11. Closed issues 110, 117 and 118
Beta 10
First Beta version. Includes functionality for the sync toggle button.
Version 0.9.0 with a functioning Interleaved mode
added version number to InitialUserSelectionActivity
disabled portrait mode for thumb respeaking
Implemented semi-working interleaved player
Added more information to recording lists; added beeps on recording; added a sensitivity slider
The version put on the phones for Steven's departure
Added landscape mode for thumb respeaking (Respeaking 2). Also fixed bug with thumb respeaking not allowing for a final segment.
Version 0.3.0: Two modes of respeaking.
Version 0.2.0. Added fixes for Steven's original release bug. Renamed packages to au.edu.unimelb.aikuma. Added Toast message to suggest user connect to wireless when syncing connection fails.
Version 0.10.3
Fixes for bugs that caused crashing in audio driven respeaking that came in with 0.10.0 and 0.10.1

Version 0.10.0. Changes: 1. When playback is driven by a button, then there is no proximity detection. 2. When buttons are held down in thumb commentary mode, the other button is disabled. 3. Pressing play multiple times rewinds the current segment in commentary mode. 4. Pausing interleaved playback does not rewind. 5. Beeps reintroduced with an end beep. 6. Dates sort reverse chronologically and the default is to sort using date.
Initial release on Google Play.
The initial version to be used by Florian in his presentation to linguists.
The last snapshot that contains the BOLDApp and old directories
set source compatibility to 1.6
aikuma cloud storage v0.1.0
